title: ‘I Think I Can Be Even Better:’ Ruth Edwards Returns With Ambitions
content:
After a two-year hiatus, US star is hoping to pick up where she left off: 'I didn't want to return to the peloton to ride bikes and have fun. I want to compete.'

Read the full article at ‘I Think I Can Be Even Better:’ Ruth Edwards Returns With Ambitions on Velo.
author: ahood
